text:
@realDonaldTrump @Twitter Mr President;
 #TDbank wants (3) months Balance of my Forbearance & Junes payment. I’ve been out of work due to Covid-19  since 02/20/20 & returned to work 05/18/20. If they really wanted to help me, they would add on the (3) months to the tail end of the mortgage! Help!!
